plot: ProfessorTomNook, a.k.a. "The Sugarcube Critic," spends his weekends reviewing and criticizing episodes of the hit children's show, "My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic."
plot_en: ProfessorTomNook, a.k.a. "The Sugarcube Critic," spends his weekends reviewing and criticizing episodes of the hit children's show, "My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic."
plot_es: ProfessorTomNook, a.k.a. "The Sugarcube Critic," spends his weekends reviewing and criticizing episodes of the hit children's show, "My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic."
title: The Sugarcube Critic
